admreg: East Asia and Pacific,East Asia and Pacific

abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the
            Enhanced Justice Sector Services Project is to enhance the
            efficiency, transparency and accountability of justice
            sector institutions. The restructuring will: 1) modify the
            project activities, particularly in the area of court
            construction, to better target government strategies and
            priorities for the development of the justice sector; 2)
            revise the project development objective (PDO) to reflect
            the project's new activities; 3) amend the results
            framework in order to align it with the revised PDO; and 4)
            extend the closing date from December 31, 2012 to June 30,
            2013, primarily to allow sufficient time to undertake the
            new civil works activities since the construction window in
            Mongolia is relatively short.
